name: Creative
description: Teams will be required to think of a unique solution to a problem of their choice based on the theme given.

name: Encryptid
description: Tech Syndicate's annual cryptic hunt, a scavenger hunt-like experience, based on web security, cryptography, and steganography.

name: Crossword
description: A tech-based crossword solely based on puns. The only things that you need to know are the names of popular tech companies, products, and games.

name: Group Discussion
description: An engaging panel discussion debating the rights and wrongs of the latest technology trends/issues.

name: Programming
description: Participants will compete with each other to solve exciting programming challenges.

name: Filmmaking
description: “If it can be written or thought, it can be filmed”, Participants will be required to create a film on the topic given.

name: Gaming
description: In round 1, participants will compete with each other in the game “Splitgate”.

name: Quiz
description: An enthralling quiz based on the field of computers, technology, and recent events in the world of IT.

name: Robotics
description: An event that tests the programming and building abilities of teams.

name: Photography
description: Participants will be required to click a photograph on their interpretation of the prompt given.

name: Paint 3d
description: “Painting is silent poetry, and poetry is a painting that speaks.” Exhibit your artistry using Paint 3D on the theme given.

name: Minecraft
description: Unleash your creativity in an infinite world where you are bound only by your imagination.

name: Scratch
description: “Keep calm and Start creating”, make a game on the theme using “Scratch 3”
